metadata.description: Background scene prompts for cultivation novel '天魔系统', featuring various locations from humble sect to cosmic dimensions, all in Chinese xianxia style without people or text
metadata.prompt_style: Chinese xianxia cultivation style, detailed visual descriptions, 8k resolution quality
metadata.usage_guideline: All prompts specify 'no people, no text, no UI elements' to ensure clean background images suitable for composition with characters later
metadata.notes: Comprehensive expansion based on storyboard chapters 1-34. Original 27 scenes enriched with multiple time/weather variants (dawn, dusk, night, snow, rain). Added 16 new major scene categories including: Tianjing Realm floating platforms, Multiverse Administration Office, Secret Realms, Void Rifts, Cosmic Exam Arenas, etc. Each main scene now includes 2-5 sub-scenes covering different conditions, times, and related locations. Total sub-scene count exceeds 120 variations. Added chinese_prompt fields for all scenes and sub-scenes.
